Uses of Interface
org.infogrid.comm.MessageEndpointListener

  • Packages that use MessageEndpointListener 
    Package Description
    org.infogrid.comm
    Communications primitives.

    • Uses of MessageEndpointListener in org.infogrid.comm

      Classes in org.infogrid.comm that implement MessageEndpointListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMessageEndpointListener<T>
      Makes implementing MessageEndpointListeners easier.
      class  AbstractWaitingEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>
      Factors out functionality common to communications endpoint that wait for responses.
      class  ReturnSynchronizerEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>
      An communication endpoint that notifies a ReturnSynchronizer when a received response to a sent message has arrived.
      class  RpcClientEndpoint<A,R,T extends CarriesInvocationId>
      An abstract communications endpoint for Remote-Procedure-Style communications.
      class  WaitForResponseEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>
      A communication endpoint that suspends the thread sending a message until a response has arrived.
